lines.text: Spit on the sidewalk and you'll die in jail!
I'm getting tired of what's right and wrong.
They hang people for that, Cora!
He wants to have a baby... How'm I gonna do that, Frank?
What are you, uh, Greek or something?

[disgusted, after seeing Frank drink milk directly from the bottle]
Will you use a glass? What are you, an animal?
I knew that when I met you... You'll never change.
All I know is, it went dark... If he'd have turned around, Frank, they'd have hanged us for it... and something... something put that cop there... It's an act of God those lights went out!
Now, you got this on the dash. And you don't know where you got this.
[Frank to Cora as he is hitting her to stage the auto crash injuries]
